review_title: Amazing network and good learning for a short duration, otherwise a terrible organization
job_title: Senior Officer, Programmer Development in Karāchi
pros:
- Amazing international network, which can be used to cater to your own learning and growth
- PD & Safeguards teams are the best ones to work with
- Access to the field as offices all across Pakistan
cons:
- A sausage fest at the senior management level 
- Lack of innovation due to staff working for 10+ years who continue to recycle old archaic material 
- Prevalent sexism in the organization 
- Terrible HR, there is no means to complaint and if you do, they treat it like a family matter 
- Bullying by senior colleagues... very sarkari system
- Toxic work culture where everyone gossips... you cannot trust people 
- Works with donors that are renowned to harm the environment... essentially helps green washing process

pros: Good Organization in term of their objectives
Conservation of natural resources and community development
cons: No more funds for conservation of natural resources and local community development

pros: Amazing learning opportunists but it has its limitations.
cons: The salary is not great, they need to reevaluate it.
